# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/nw.js`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for nw.js (http://nwjs.io).

# Details
Files were exported from https://www.github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/nw.js
